issue.title: [CI] Substrait Integration Testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment the Substrait consumer test suite is developed at <https://github.com/substrait-io/consumer-testing.> To evaluate the performance and functionality against Acero/Substrait development, an integration test suite is important.
